00033 /* Template for printing out a generic vector or array. */
00034 template<class T> inline void PrintDmExample(const std::string &descript, const std::string &name, T start, T end) {
00035   std::cout.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00036   std::cout.precision(20);
00037   std::cout << name << "\t" << descript;
00038   for(; start != end; ++start) {
00039 
00040     std::cout << "\t" << *start;
00041   }
00042   std::cout << std::endl;
00043 }
00044 
00045 /** Little template function to make string conversion easy. 
00046     this isn't the fastest way to do things, but it is easy. */
00047 template <class T> 
00048 std::string ToDmStr(const T &t) {
00049   std::ostringstream s;
00050   s.setf(std::ios_base::boolalpha);
00051   s << t; 
00052   return s.str();
00053 };
